div.div:
Adds Home Screen Top Bar and Icons
This commit introduces a new `BfabTopBar` composable for the home screen, along with the necessary icons and string resources.
Key changes: - **`BfabTopBar` Composable:** - Created a new `BfabTopBar` composable in `composeApp/src/commonMain/kotlin/com/bfab/cmp/presentation/component/topbar/BfabTopBar.kt`. - The top bar includes an app logo, a search bar, a notification icon, and a location icon. - It allows for optional notification and location indicator dots. - Handles click events for search, notification, and location actions. - **New Icons:** - Added `ic_home_location.xml` for the location pin. - Added `ic_notification.xml` for the notification bell. - Added `ic_search.xml` for the search icon. - Added `topbar_app_logo.xml` for the application logo displayed in the top bar. - **String Resources:** - Added a new string resource `search` for the search bar placeholder text. - Added a new content description string `desc_notification` for the notification icon. - **Dimension Updates:** - Added `radiusFull` to `Dimen.kt` for fully rounded corners, used in the search bar.

Refactors BlockRendererFactory for improved type safety and logging
This commit introduces several improvements to the `BlockRendererFactory`:
- **Type Safety:** - Implemented a new inline helper function `createFactoryEntry` to ensure type safety when defining renderer factories. This function uses reified type parameters to associate `CMSBlock` KClasses directly with their corresponding renderer provider lambdas, reducing the chances of type mismatches. - The `createRenderer` function now uses the specific `KClass<out T>` of the input block for lookups and caching, enhancing type precision. - **Logging:** - Updated log messages to be more specific and informative, including the block type's simple name. - Added logging for cache hits, cache clearing, and when no factory is found for a block type. - Shortened the "Initialized" log message for brevity. - **Code Clarity:** - Removed an unused `logger` instance from `TopBrandsBlockRenderer`. - Simplified the `create` companion object function in `BlockRendererFactory`. - Improved KDoc comments for clarity and to reflect the changes.
The `UNCHECKED_CAST` suppression in `createRenderer` remains, but its risk is mitigated by the more robust type checking provided by `createFactoryEntry` during factory map initialization.

Implements Instagram Posts Block Renderer and UI Enhancements
This commit introduces the rendering capabilities for Instagram Posts CMS blocks on the home screen. It also includes minor UI adjustments for consistency in padding.
Key changes include: - **Instagram Posts Block Rendering:** - Added `InstagramPostsBlockRenderer` to display Instagram posts with a title, "See All" link, and a horizontal list of images. - Each image is clickable and triggers a `BlockAction.LaunchUrl` action. - Integrated `InstagramPostsBlockRenderer` into the `BlockRendererFactory`. - **Block Action Handling:** - Added `BlockAction.LaunchUrl` to the `BlockAction` sealed interface and updated the handler in `Home.kt` to log the URL. - **UI Enhancements:** - Updated `ProductGridBlockRenderer` to use horizontal padding for `LazyRow` consistency. - **Dimension Updates:** - Added new dimensions `cmsInstaImageHeight` and `cmsInstaImageWidth` for Instagram post images in `Dimen.kt`.

Implements `MiddleCategoryBlockRenderer` and `DealOfTheDayBlockRenderer`
This commit introduces two new block renderers: `MiddleCategoryBlockRenderer` for displaying categorized image galleries and `DealOfTheDayBlockRenderer` for showcasing deal items.
Key changes include: - **`MiddleCategoryBlockRenderer`:** - Displays a title and a row of selectable category tabs. - Renders a horizontal list of images for the selected category. - Supports both `LazyRow` (for more than 4 items) and `Row` with `horizontalScroll` (for 4 or fewer items) for displaying category images. - Includes animations for tab selection and content changes. - **`DealOfTheDayBlockRenderer`:** - Displays items in a `FlowRow` with a maximum of 4 items per row and up to 2 rows. - Each item shows an image and a title. - **`BlockRendererFactory` Updates:** - Added entries for `MiddleCategoryBlock` and `DealOfTheDayBlock` to instantiate their respective renderers. - **Dimension Updates:** - Added `cmsCategoryImageHeight` and `cmsDealOfTheDayImageSize` to `Dimensions.kt` for styling the new blocks. - **Minor Formatting:** - Removed an extra newline in `BannerImageBlockRenderer.kt`.

Refactors BannerImageBlock rendering and enhances Pager dimensions
This commit introduces a dedicated `BannerImageBlockRenderer` for handling `BannerImageBlock` types, moving this logic out of the `MainBannerBlockRenderer`. It also adds specific minimum height dimensions for main and small pagers within CMS blocks.
Key changes: - **BannerImageBlock Rendering:** - Created `BannerImageBlockRenderer` to specifically render `BannerImageBlock` data. - Updated `BlockRendererFactory` to use `BannerImageBlockRenderer` for `BannerImageBlock` instances. - **Pager UI Enhancements:** - Added `cmsMainPagerMinHeight` and `cmsSmallPagerMinHeight` to `Dimensions` for better control over pager appearance. - Applied `cmsMainPagerMinHeight` to the `HorizontalPager` within `MainBannerBlockRenderer`. - Applied `cmsSmallPagerMinHeight` to the `HorizontalPager` within the new `BannerImageBlockRenderer`. - **Code Refinements:** - `MainBannerBlockRenderer` now focuses solely on its original purpose. - The new `BannerImageBlockRenderer` includes logic for displaying an optional title above the banner images.

Updates image URL fields in DTOs to use SafeUrl
This commit modifies `BannerItemDto` and `BrandItemDto` to use the `SafeUrl` type for fields representing image URLs (`media`, `mobmedia`, `images`, `mobileImage`).
This change ensures that these URL strings are properly sanitized and formatted, preventing potential issues with URLs containing spaces or other special characters. The corresponding domain model mapping functions (`toDomain`) have also been updated to extract the `String` value from `SafeUrl`.

Implements Top Brands CMS Block and Dynamic Layout Generation
This commit introduces the rendering capabilities for the "Top Brands" CMS block, along with a dynamic layout generation system for arranging brand images.
Key changes include:
- **Top Brands Block:** - Added `TopBrandsBlockRenderer` to render the "Top Brands" section, including a title, subtitle, brand images, and a "View All" button. - Introduced `NavigateToBrand` to the `BlockAction` sealed interface to handle navigation when a brand image is clicked. - Updated `BrandItemDto` and `BrandItem` to rename `mobileImages` to `mobileImage` for consistency. - **Dynamic Layout Generation:** - Created `DynamicImageLayout` class to process a list of `BrandItem`s and arrange them into various `LayoutItem` configurations (e.g., `SingleStack`, `TwoHorizontalStack`, `ThreeMixedStack`). This allows for more visually engaging brand displays. - Added `LayoutItem` sealed class to represent the different layout configurations. - Implemented a `BrandImage` composable for displaying individual brand images with click handling. - **UI Enhancements & Refinements:** - Added new dimensions to `Dimen.kt` for different brand image sizes (`cmsBrandImageLargeHeight`, `cmsBrandImageNormalHeight`, `cmsBrandImageSmallHeight`). - Added padding to the `ProductGridBlockRenderer`. - Improved logging in `HomeScreen` for block actions. - Ensured `LazyColumn` in `HomeScreen` uses `blockId` as a key for item stability during recompositions. - **Factory and ViewModel Updates:** - Integrated `TopBrandsBlockRenderer` into the `BlockRendererFactory`. - Removed a `TODO` comment in `CmsProductListItem`. - **Testing:** - Added unit tests for `DynamicImageLayout` to verify its layout generation logic. - Updated `HomeCmsParserTest` to use the `withListParser` factory method.

ProductGridBlockRender Improvement
made lost of change to ProductGridBlockRenderer and created uimodel for product and finished ui for product list item

Introduces SafeUrl type for URL sanitization
This commit adds a new value class `SafeUrl` and a custom serializer `SafeUrlSerializer`.
The `SafeUrlSerializer` ensures that URLs are properly formatted by replacing spaces with "%20" during deserialization. This new type is used in `CategoryItemDto` for image and mobileImage fields to prevent issues with URLs containing spaces.

Implements Home Screen CMS Block Rendering and UI Enhancements
This commit introduces the rendering capabilities for various CMS blocks on the home screen, including main banners, top category carousels, category grids, and product grids. It establishes a `BlockRendererFactory` to dynamically create and cache appropriate renderers for each block type, along with a `BlockActionHandler` interface to manage user interactions within these blocks.
Key changes include: - **CMS Block Rendering:** - Added `BlockRenderer` interface and concrete implementations for `MainBannerBlock`, `TopCategoryBlock`, `CategoryTopBlock`, and `ProductGridBlock`. - Introduced `BlockRendererFactory` to manage the creation and caching of block renderers. - Implemented `BlockAction` sealed interface and `BlockActionHandler` for handling user interactions like navigation, add to cart/wishlist. - **Home Screen UI:** - Integrated block rendering into the `HomeScreen` using `LazyColumn`. - Implemented a `PagerIndicator` composable for banner carousels. - Added `CmsProductListItem` and `CategoryItem` composables for displaying products and categories within blocks. - **Data Model Updates:** - Modified `CategorySectionDto` to use `ImmutableList` for its content. - Added a `lazyKey` to the `Product` domain model for stable identification in lists. - **UI Enhancements:** - Introduced a `bounceClickable` modifier extension for interactive elements. - Updated text color for signup/login links on authentication screens. - Added new dimensions for product list items and icons. - Added a new `caption` text style to `BfabTypography`. - Updated `surfaceContainer` color in `BfabColors`. - **ViewModel Updates:** - `HomeViewModel` now fetches and updates the UI state with CMS data. - `HomeUIState` includes the list of `CMSBlock`s.

cms data parsing changes
this include more changes for cms parsing
